# responses

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-context-stream" symbolName="AsyncContextStream" /> AsyncContextStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

This class supports async iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.
Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-context-structured-stream" symbolName="AsyncContextStructuredStream" /> AsyncContextStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM with context.

This class supports async iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive
from the model. Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:**

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-stream" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

This class supports async iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

This class supports iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.
Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="context-stream-chunk" symbolName="ContextStreamChunk" /> ContextStreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from a contextual LLM call.

Context stream chunks represent incremental pieces of a response that are delivered
as they are generated by the model, allowing for real-time display and processing
with access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT, T]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}, {"type_str": "T", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "T", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />
